uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.content

Class AbstractXMLBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.content.AbstractXMLBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExtendedXMLBuilder, SimpleXMLBuilder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    XMLPrinter, XMLWriter

    public abstract class AbstractXMLBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExtendedXMLBuilder
    Base class for creating SimpleXMLBuilder implementations. This class tracks the sax type elements of the SimpleXMLBuilder to accumulate the attributes.

        public boolean setEscapeUnicode(boolean escape_unicode)
        Description copied from interface: SimpleXMLBuilder
        Should high code-point unicode characters be escaped to avoid charset problems. This is advisory only the implementation is free to ignore this call and return false in all cases.
